alert.note: Alert for Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:18PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Outagamie County through 100 PM CDT... At 1217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Creek, or 10 miles north of Appleton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Outagamie County, including the following locations... Twelve Corners, Murphy Corner, Five Corners, Rose Lawn, Binghamton, Chicago Corners, Oneida and Freedom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
